original_title: El niño Fidencio, el taumaturgo de Espinazo
overview: People from throughout Mexico and the southern United States used to gather at the hacienda El Espinazo to meet with this healer. Was he a charlatan, or a prophet who in many ways surpassed the procedures of modern medicine?
title: El niño Fidencio, el taumaturgo de Espinazo
